data.actual_result: Entry doesn't show what permissions were granted/denied
data.expected_result: Entry shows what permissions were granted/denied
data.short_description: Audit log entries for updating channel permissions don't say what permission was granted
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel where you can view the audit log and manage channels - Update the permissions of any user/role in a channel - Go to the audit log and view that entry
